crosswordDatas.clue: A small, fast storage location within the CPU used to hold data temporarily during processing.
The component of the CPU responsible for performing arithmetic and logic operations on data
The part of the CPU that manages the execution of instructions by fetching them from memory, decoding them, and controlling the operation of other CPU components.
The basic unit of time in a microprocessor, representing the duration of one clock signal and often used as a measure of the processor's speed.
A signal generated by a device or software that temporarily suspends the execution of the current program and transfers control to an interrupt service routine.
